Summary: I saw a black triangular UFO with large small lig
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving east on West 6th st toward the gas station by Hwy 38 and saw theUFo hovering over the top of a patch of wooded area across Hwy 28. I noticed itas I approched the stop sign by the gas station. A UFO. mild shock, excitementdisbelief and awe. It was a black triangular craft hovering silently withlights and windows visable to my eyesight. I driove away and went to work at thecafe I was working at at the time. I told my friends about it, but tey werentto quick to believe me, and didnt go see if they foulf spot it.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Belle
There were no other sightings in Belle on or around May 31st 1972
